nodes.text: A Sector Group was a formation of Imperial Military and intelligence assets of the Galactic Empire in a sector of the galaxy. Each Moff was in command of their Sector Group. Twenty-four Imperial-class Star Destroyers were assigned to each of the regional 1,024 sectors, operating as a Sector Group. These forces allowed the Empire to spread across star systems to patrol and uphold the will of the Galactic Emperor. As the threat of the Alliance to Restore the Republic grew, the Star Destroyers became the primary method of enforcing the Emperor's will.

Sector Groups were introduced into the new Star Wars canon through the twentieth issue of the De Agostini magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon, published in 2015. Sector Groups also existed in the Star Wars Legends continuity, being first mentioned in the 1989 Imperial Sourcebook, which was authored by Greg Gorden and published by West End Games for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
